entities.name: boggart
entities.description: A creature that takes on the form of its victim's worst fear. (Chapter on boggarts)

entities.name: professor lupin
entities.description: The Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher who deliberately stopped Harry from tackling the boggart.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: A student in Professor Lupin's class who was not allowed to tackle the boggart due to his previous collapse on the train.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: A student in Professor Lupin's class who shouted about seeing a banshee.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: A student in Professor Lupin's class who waved his hand around and mentioned seeing a hand.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A teacher who was seen by the students in a hat, possibly as a form of their fear.

entities.name: lavender
entities.description: A student in Professor Lupin's class who wondered why Professor Lupin is frightened of crystal balls.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: A student in Professor Lupin's class who thought the lesson was the best they've ever had.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A student in Professor Lupin's class who agreed with Ron that the lesson was good.

relationships.description: Professor Lupin stopped Harry from tackling the boggart because he thought Harry wasn't up to much.
Seamus shouted about seeing a banshee, indicating that he saw it.
Dean waved his hand around and mentioned seeing a hand, indicating that he saw it.
The students saw Snape in a hat, possibly as a form of their fear.
